segments.text: Good morning . I'd like to buy tickets to Paris .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Four . Two adults and two children . Is there any discount ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Babies under six months are free of charge . We offer 50 % discount to children under 7 . How old are your children ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: One is 4 months and the other is years old .
segments.speaker: S1
